https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/d0W1jrBWHRxEkE6MY8xTV8UhaP0.jpg In the wake of her parents' death, Kara Fallon struggles to maintain her sanity through increasingly intense encounters with a weeping spirit of Irish legend. If these visions are not real, how can the eccentric comic book artist Duff capture her terror so vividly in his latest work, "Cry"? Cry
